problem.problem_statement: What are some fun ways to teach people about the importance of bees?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

problem.problem_statement: How can we make getting clean water from the sea more efficient?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all

problem.problem_statement: How can we use natural methods to manage floods?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all

problem.problem_statement: How does breaking up forests into smaller parts affect wildlife?
problem.goalTitle: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss

problem.problem_statement: What can we do to attract more different kinds of bees to our farms to grow better crops?
problem.goalTitle: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
